product_name: REI Sariska Print Tank Top - Women's
long_description: The REI Sariska Print tank top brings together tranquil styling with moisture-wicking fabric, keeping you comfortable when you start to perspire during yoga. Very soft polyester and spandex blend ensures moisture-wicking comfort with 4-way stretch. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Internal shelf bra offers light support and includes molded, removable bra cups to enhance support and fit. Mesh bra lining enhances comfort and increases breathability. Fabric gathering at sides adds a touch of feminine style. The REI Sariska Print tank top offers an active fit that moves effortlessly with the body and won't bind or twist.
short_description: The REI Sariska Print tank top brings together tranquil styling with moisture-wicking fabric, keeping you comfortable when you start to perspire during yoga.
